title: Doktrinen
overview: Journalist Nina Wed√©n gets the political scoop century and finds herself fast-tracked to becoming the Press Secretary for Sweden's newly appointed Foreign Minister, Jacob Weiss. As she gets closer to her new boss, Nina uncovers dark secrets that shed a sinister light on her path to this seismic career shift ; has she unwittingly become a pawn in a game that threaten the country's national security ? Set against the backdrop of the war in Ukraine, Nina will come uncomfortably close to Russian Intelligence operation to undermine Sweden's relationship with NATO.
